actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Pipeline Safety Act of 1968, as amended, to authorize additional appropriations.
short_title: Natural Gas Pipeline Safety Act Authorization Amendments

summary.text: Natural Gas Pipeline Safety Act Authorization Amendments - Amends the Natural Gas Pipeline Safety Act of 1968 to authorize the appropriation of $3,500,000 for fiscal year 1978 to carry out the general provisions of such Act. Authorizes the appropriation of $2,500,000 for fiscal year 1978 for Federal grants-in-aid to State enforcement authorities.

titles.title: Natural Gas Pipeline Safety Act Authorization Amendments
A bill to amend the Natural Gas Pipeline Safety Act of 1968, as amended, to authorize additional appropriations.
